name: Marketing Expense
query:
SELECT
    name as "ID:Link/Sales Invoice:100",
    posting_date as "Date::100",
    customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:150",
    company as "Company::180",
    order_type as "Order Type::120",
    discount_amount as "Marketing Expense::120",
    Status as "status::200"
FROM
    `tabSales Invoice`
WHERE
    order_type = "Marketing"
    AND company = %(company)s
    AND posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
